4. Molecule TypeÂ¶

This section present first the structure of the Molecule Type object. Then, how to initialized a MT and how to assigned molecule of the topology file to this MT.

The SingleMolecule object is presented, but this part is adressed to advance user.

Finally it summarized the available MT.
